attributes.action: Support an innovative Martial Arts Academy for children in London.
attributes.additional_details: Benefits to students, self-regulation, self-discipline, improved academic performance, tackling obesity, encouraging courtesy, integrity, perseverance, self-control and indomitable spirit (Meade TKD 2012). CUIDAR  (2004) Stevenson Lee et al (1990) Woodwards (2009).
attributes.background: Martial Arts a vehicle to teach self-discipline. The project identified potential benefits within the community through participation. The project aimed to highlight the tangible and intangible benefits on an individual level & segmented group.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Youth services in your local area are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
